name: 12th International Conference on Digital Image Processing and Vision
content: 12th International Conference on Digital Image Processing and Vision (ICDIPV 2023) July 29 \~ 30, 2023, London, United Kingdom https://itcse2023.org/icdipv/index Scope & Topics 12thInternational Conference on Digital Image Processing and Vision (ICDIPV 2023) is a forum for presenting new advances and research results in the fields of Digital Image Processing and vision. The conference will bring together leading researchers, engineers and scientists in the domain of interest from around the world. Authors are solicited to contribute to the conference by submitting articles that illustrate research results, projects, surveying works and industrial experiences that describe significant advances in the following areas, but are not limited to Topics of interest include, but are not limited to, the following:  Applied Digital Signal Processing  Coding and Transmission  Computer Graphics and Visualization  Computer Vision  Data Analytics and Machine Learning  Deep Learning: Algorithms, Implementations, and applications  Digital Signal Processing in Communications  Emerging Technologies in Digital Signal Processing  Emerging Technologies  Human Biometrics and Security Systems  Internet of Things Technology  Image & signal processing Applications  Image Acquisition and Display  Image and Video Processing & Analysis  Image Formation  Image Scanning, Display and Printing  Machine Learning, Computer Graphics, Biological Vision  Medical Signal Acquisition, Analysis and Processing  Signal and Information Processing for Smart Systems  Signal and Information Processing in Education  Storage and Retrieval Paper Submission Authors are invited to submit papers through the conference Submission System by February 04, 2023\. Submissions must be original and should not have been published previously or be under consideration for publication while being evaluated for this conference. The proceedings of the conference will be published by Computer Science Conference Proceedings in Computer Science & Information Technology (CS & IT) series (Confirmed). Selected papers from ICDIPV 2023, after further revisions, will be published in the special issue of the following journal.  Signal & Image Processing: An International Journal (SIPIJ)  International Journal of VLSI design & Communication Systems (VLSICS)  International Journal of Embedded Systems and Applications (IJESA)  International Journal on Organic Electronics (IJOE)  Information Technology in Industry (ITII) Important Dates • Submission Deadline : February 04, 2023 • Authors Notification : March 25, 2023 • Registration & Camera-Ready Paper Due : April 03, 2023 Contact Us Here's where you can reach us : icdipv@itcse2023.org or icdipconf@yahoo.com
